TEXT.TITLE: NYNEX <NYN> INCREASES QTRLY CASH DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Nynex Corp said it is raising its quarterly dividend to 95 cts from 87 cts payable May 1, 1987, to shareholders of record March 31. The company said this was the third consecutive year it has raised its quarterly cash dividend. It added it had a two-for-one stock split in May 1986. Reuter
